toolbelt.title: My Tool Belt
toolbelt.text: Fireworks (RIP). Sublime Text 2 + Emmet (ex Zen Coding). LESS. SASS + Compass. Grunt (with LiveReload!). Bower. Yeoman. Modernizr. Git & Github.

updated.title: I keep updated with
updated.text: Blogs: A List Apart, Smashing Magazine, CSS Tricks, Netttuts+, 24 ways, CSS Wizardry and a lot more. Weekly news: Web Design Weekly, CSS Weekly, HTML5 Weekly, JavaScript Weekly, wpMail.me.

hobbies.title: Hobbies
hobbies.text: My work is my hobbie! (I swear I'm a happy guy :P). I keep reading and trying new UX things. I love reading. I love music. I love movies. I love traveling and knowing new places.
